AUTHOR: FwiedWice
INSTALL_MSG: You have successfully installed configurations. Use the command carefully.
NAME: Config
SHORT: Basic utility cogs such as list the servers the bot is in, usercount, and listing the users with the same discriminator
DESCRIPTION: By using [p]notify shutdown, sends a shutdown message. Otherwise, use [p]notify [message], that will send the [message] instead. Also, use [p]listservers to list the servers the bot is in: serverid + usercount + servername
